ValidationRule.description: If Lead Status is "Closed Lost", Closed Reason is mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "012C0000000GVOS", ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed Lost"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Reason__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the Closed Reason as Lead Status is Closed Lost.
